channel.title: so how can we get BMS assets and maps into SFM?
channel.description:
planning on doing a black mesa source project using SFM, hopefully using guard duty and operation black mesa once those come out as well. and i know there is a method to get portal and other game assets into SFM but im not sure how that would work with BMS.
so anyone know how to or succesfully done it?

item.title: so how can we get BMS assets and maps into SFM?
item.dc:creator: Bubonic
item.description:
Also https://steamcommunity.com/groups/OpenSourceFilmmaker is a fairly new group with the air of sharing rigs models tutorials etc.

Read full topic
item.source: so how can we get BMS assets and maps into SFM?

item.title: so how can we get BMS assets and maps into SFM?
item.dc:creator: Flafla2
item.description:
Also, in video form: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QdsZSjHkbxw

Note that this particular tutorial is for the newer tf2 models, but the process is pretty much the same (just use sourcemods/BMS instead).

BTW, you should watch Jimmer Linsâ€™ tips of the day as a general SFM resource. They are very helpful.
